page.title: 03WOKINGHAM - RELIGION
page.content: Wokingham has two{CHURCH OF {ENGLAND CHURCHES,}All Saints and St. Pauls. All Saints was dedicated c.1190. The Rector is the Rev. Brian Bailey. The Rev. Peter Rapsey is Rector of St. Pauls, dedicated in 1864. Father John Keenan is the Priest at the{ROMAN CATHOLIC CHURCH}of Corpus Christi, consecrated in l970. The Minister of the{METHODIST {CHURCH}in Rose Street is the Rev. Robert McBain. The Rev. Lawrence Jones is the Minister of the{BAPTIST CHURCH}in Milton Road, founded in l774. The{EVANGELICAL CHURCH}is situated in Norreys Avenue. There are three church schools in Wokingham, Palmer C.E. Junior, St. Pauls C.E. Junior and St. Teresas R.C. Primary School.
